    public static final String
    TRIGGER_TO_DELETE_OLDER
    "CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS delete_old_saves\nAFTER INSERT ON saves\nWHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM saves) > 10\nBEGIN\n DELETE FROM saves\n WHERE id NOT IN (\n SELECT id\n FROM saves\n ORDER BY save_time DESC\n LIMIT 10\n );\nEND;\n"
